name: Fabled 100 Corners
description:
Idle/incremental game for Mini Jam 121

Hit the corner of the screen 100 times to win. Every wall hit gets you money to buy upgrades for faster movement, more blocks and bumpers you can place around. All while still using your monitor for other things.

You can also import a folder of pictures to be used.

Made with Godot 4 Beta, may be a bit unstable because of it. Tested on a Windows 16:9 monitor.
